"Hey, you showed up. Thanks.": "I'm glad to see you've cheered up a bit."
"That girl came to visit me when I was unconscious."
"She would show up several more times, trying to talk to me little by little..."

"But at the time, I was pushing everyone away mentally,
so I didn't really listen to what she was saying..."
"Now, though, I think we've started to understand each other a bit..."
"Well, you finally told everyone your feelings."
"What about when you came to your senses?"
"Just remembering it makes my face get all red..."
"She even teased me about it. \"So you CAN show emotions after all!\" she said..."
"I don't mind seeing that side of you."
"And now I'm getting it from you..."
"That was entirely your fault to begin with, you know?"
"Putting me on the monitor all of a sudden like that..."
"Honestly, not even I thought I was going to be able to say all of that."
"I've lived most of my life in the bizarre environment of the Resurgent ARKS."
"...So, I might end up making more mistakes again in the future..."
"When I start acting weird again, can you just talk some sense into me again?"
"No, I'd like it if YOU did that for me."
